name: DrumSim
description:
Simple drumkit simulator. Can be played with either the Keyboard or the Vive Motion controllers. Roomscale. Best played seated.

When playing with motion controllers, you can control the volume of the drums by how fast you hit them.Motion Controls
  • Drumsticks: Motion control
  • Hihat Pedal: Left Trigger
  • Bass Pedal: Right Trigger
Keyboard Controls
  • Hihat: S
  • Crash: W
  • Ride: L
  • Snare: D
  • Toms: F, J, K
  • Hihat Pedal: Left Shift
  • Bass Drum Pedal: Spacebar
